facts.text: I'm a designer clownfish! Breeders carefully selected my parents to create my unique Picasso pattern - no two of us look exactly alike!
My name comes from the famous artist Pablo Picasso because my white markings look like abstract art splashed across my body!
I'm 100% captive-bred, which means I was born in an aquarium, not caught from the ocean. This helps protect wild reefs!

profile.diet: Pellets, frozen mysis shrimp, and brine shrimp
